name: Mace Madness
description:
Created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jame Themed: "Out of Control"

Revisions are being uploaded throughout this weekend so we are able to test the WebGL builds and make sure we have something uploaded if we are running close to the end time.

Battle with BADnanas and you attempt to control your "Mace". Use your momentum to swing the mace and try to avoid the peels, because they may slip you up.

The plan was to create traps and enemies that all effected the players movement, time was running out so some things go cut short. 

After voting we will possibly return to this project to add some features :)

Programming : Crychair (Sleeping Donut)
Audio : Emmitt Spliff ( Youtube)
Art : Alcy (Twitter, Portfolio)

Testers: Thanks to all our friends who gave us feedback/suggestions
